changes.description: Change generated union variant classes to public in trait codegen
Added protocol test to test xml attribute members that are declared between non-attribute members.

Added a section to discuss recommendations for implementing Smithy clients. Currently this section only includes information about HTTP interfaces, but it will expand over time to cover more topics related to implementing clients.
Improve BDD sifting (2x speed, more reduction)
Added the shared file manifest to directed codegen interfaces so that it can be easily used by integrations.
Add CostOptimization for cost-based BDD sifting
Added a `SnippetConfig` class to codgen-core that allows sharing doc snippets that will be consumed by smithy-docgen.
Make husky only work for files under /docs
Remove [] from toString on some rules engine types
Fix toBuilder not supplying cloudWatchNamespace in the aws.api#service trait
Updated smithy-docgen to consume snippet files to generate example sections.
Added a generic evaluator/interpreter for JMESPath expressions.
Implement rules engine ITE fn and S3 tree transform
